fields.headline: Azed crossword 2,496
fields.bodyText: Click here to access the print version Every answer is in The Chambers Dictionary (2014). Rules and requests Each numbered square in the diagram is surrounded by eight blank squares. All clues lead to answers of eight letters, and these are to be entered around their appropriate numbers, clockwise or anticlockwise, beginning anywhere. Solvers must determine where each begins and the direction in which it is to go. e twelve unchecked letters at the corners of the completed diagram may be arranged as BUTLER’S TOAST. We regret that prizes for our puzzles are temporarily suspended.
